title: Saved connections not respecting specified logon credentials
author: hux2000
body_snippet:
<!-- Bug -->
|||
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 10 Enterprise, x64, build 10586.164 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.72.5065.32737  |

For saved RDP connections (I haven't tested with other types), if you connect to the system using the Microsoft RDP client, with a different username than the one stored in the mRemoteNG connection, mRemoteNG will thereafter use that username and not the one in the stored connection.

comments.snippet:
I had this problem over the weekend, and after updating to the latest version and still having the problem I found this thread.
Since there was no fix or workaround posted, figured I'd share my workaround: I opened mstsc.exe, make sure show options is expanded, selected each computer in the Computer drop down list and made sure whatever option is under the user name box was set to counter use of saved credentials and clicked Save before moving on to the next computer in the drop down list or clo...
